heading: Six New Uniques with Diablo 4 Season 1!
content: With the arrival of  Patch 1.1.0. for Season 1, we have 6 new to hunt down! There is one new item for each class, along with one general item, which is confirmed to be the out of the bunch. Get your characters ready to grind away for these items. Gain a random Shrine effect for 10-20 seconds after killing an Elite enemy. Can only occur once every 30 seconds. Lucky Hit - Your Core Skills have up to a 20% chance to Freeze enemies for 3 seconds and deal 0.75-1.5 Cold damage to them. deal 0.5-1.0 damage to Nearby Poisoned enemies. : Lucky Hit - While you have an active , hitting an enemy outside of a has up to a 5-25% chance to spawn an additional at their location. Each of your active Sacrifice bonuses increases the chance by 25% and the total number of additional you can have by +1. has a 30-80% chance to fire an arrow that bounces off walls and scenery. Hitting enemies from behind with will make them Vulnerable for 3 seconds. Gain the effect of the for free. When you Evade using , you are taken to a random location. With this absolute massive patch coming, the game as we know it is going to shift quite a bit! The will be breaking down all parts of this patch down into Seasonal Guides in our Resources menu, (with season release), updated , and more that you have come to expect from us. Some of these guides may take a little more time than others due to the tight window of the content being released, but rest assured we are working around the clock to get this out to you. With that said, head over to our and select the D4 role in to stay up to date with our content development to make the most of your Season 1 experience! Written by: Reviewed by:
